SENT.plain: The effect of hypothyroidism on the cardiovascular system has been well documented
Cardiac dysfunction due to hypothyroidism manifests as both systolic and diastolic dysfunction of the heart leading to cardiac arrhythmia and congestive heart failure
Its presentation in the form of refractory hypotension is rare
We describe a 52 year old man on whom Hypothyroid Cardiomyopathy manifested as cardiogenic shock responsive only to thyroxin replacement
